players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I have confirmed that Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to stop further killings."
You: "Charlie, can you clarify how you confirmed Bob is mafia? Did you investigate him last night?"
You: "I believe Charlie is the detective and his investigation is reliable. We should vote Bob out."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation results—Bob is mafia. We must vote to arrest him now before he kills again. Alice, thank you for trusting my word."
Bob: "Charlie and Alice, your claims are baseless and clearly aimed at framing me because you have no solid proof. You should question why Diana was killed before rushing to accuse."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
